https://tmrev.io/movie/832851-A Napoleon from Hanover 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "A Napoleon from Hanover" tells the story about a modern Don Quixote: Wolfgang Krone. When Wolfgang Krone worked in a lorry factory, he produced a feature film about Napoleon's Russian War. For more than 20 years he has been yearning to be recognized as an artist. A Napoleon from Hanover
